import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './App.css'; export default function App() { const courses=[ {id: "MarcheF",nom:"Marche femmes",categorie:"F", distance:10000 }, {id: "MarcheH",nom:"Marche hommes",categorie:"H", distance:10000 }, {id: "MarathonF",nom:"Marathon fommes",categorie:"F", distance:42000 }, {id: "MarathonH",nom:"Marathon hommes",categorie:"H", distance:42000 } ] ; const participants=[ {id: "1", nom:"Med", idCourse: "MarcheH"}, {id: "2",nom:"Rajae", idCourse: "MarcheF"} ] const[index,setIndex]=useState(0) const[afficher,setAfficher]=useState(participants) function DeletParticip(id){ setAfficher(afficher.filter(it=>it.idCourse!==id)) } const[vr,setVar]=useState('none') const[nvparti,setNvparti]=useState(0) let bg={display:`${vr}`} function afchParticipant(){ setVar(vr==='none'?'block':'none') const newParti={ id:participants.length+1, nomNvl, } setNvparti(participants.find((f)=>f.idCourse===courses[index].id)) } return (
